name: DeadShot (JL GAMES)
description:
Much better and more fun than a game .io

You have different weapons to choose from. Use the most powerful and destroy your enemies. Do not forget to collect enough ammunition to survive the extensive battle against your enemies. Collect enough money to buy grenades and go well equipped to the battlefield. What are you waiting? Download it and play now!

No installation needed, just run and play ! It is super optimized, it only weighs 5mb.
